{{ModId}}_Deer.ShopDescription: Adults can be shorn for wool. Sheep who form a close bond with their owners can grow wool faster. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool.\nLives in the barn.
{{ModId}}_Deer.ShopMissingBuildingDescription: Requires construction of a Deluxe Barn

{{ModId}}_Dove.ShopMissingBuildingDescription: Requires construction of a Deluxe Coop

{{ModId}}_Llama.ShopDescription: Adults can be shorn for wool. Sheep who form a close bond with their owners can grow wool faster. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool.\nLives in the barn.
{{ModId}}_Llama.ShopMissingBuildingDescription: Requires construction of a Deluxe Barn

{{ModId}}_MaleOstrich.ShopDescription: A male ostrich. It doesn't do much.

{{ModId}}_Drake.ShopDescription: A cute duck that likes to swim.
